text.text_translated:
Street art is art that people make on walls or streets.  
We cannot know how street art will develop in the future.  
New things happen.  
Most street artists are young people.  
They paint in their city or area.  
More artists travel around the world.  
They work there.  
Artists also use the internet to talk.  
They share photos of their work online.  
More people in art world say street art is real art.  
We do not know what will happen in the future.  
But we are sure street art will stay.

feedback.feedback:
FAIL: Fidelity Failure. The BERTScore of 0.8889 is below the required 0.90. This indicates a significant loss of key words and factual phrasing from the original text due to overly aggressive simplification.

- The phrase 'giving more recognition to street art as a legitimate art form' was oversimplified to 'More people in art world say street art is real art'. This loses the important concepts of 'recognition' and 'legitimacy'.
- The concept of 'certain trends are emerging' was reduced to 'New things happen'. This is too vague and loses the original meaning.
- The phrase 'art world' is grammatically incorrect. It must be 'the art world'.

Suggestion: Rephrase to restore the core concepts while maintaining A2 simplicity. Instead of 'say street art is real art', use 'think street art is a real type of art'. Instead of 'New things happen', use 'Some new things are starting'. Correct the grammatical error.

best_attempt.text_translated:
Street art is art that people make on walls or streets.  
We cannot know how street art will develop in the future.  
Some new things are appearing.  
Most street artists are young people.  
They paint in their city or area.  
More artists travel around the world.  
They work there.  
Artists also use the internet to talk.  
They share photos of their work online.  
The art world gives more recognition to street art as real art.  
We do not know what will happen in the future.  
But we are sure street art will stay.
